revised_title: Experiments with Lamas and Ticunas Poison on Living Animals
tldr: The author conducts experiments on living animals using the poisons of Lamas and Ticunas, detailing the effects and precautions necessary when working with these dangerous substances. The experiments reveal that only quadrupeds and birds are killed by the poison, while other animals, such as insects and reptiles, show signs of disorder but do not die.
